title: Concio habita coram serenissimo, Iacobo, Angliæ, Scotiæ, Franciæ et Hyberniæ Rege, fidei Defensore, &c. Apud curiam Hamptoniensem. De Iure ac potestate conuocandorum cœtuum Die Dominico 28. Septemb. Anno 1606. per D. Doctorem Andrews, Episcopum Chichestrensem Latinitate donata.
author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.
notes: A translation of: Andrewes, Lancelot.  A sermon preached before the Kings Majestie, at Hampton Court, concerning the right of calling assemblies.
Actual place of publication from STC.
Running title reads: Concio de iure & potestate conuocandorum cœtuum.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
